titleStmt.title: JRC-ACQUIS 31980D0565 English
80/565/Euratom: Council Decision of 9 June 1980 approving the conclusion by the Commission of the International Convention on the physical protection of nuclear material

notesStmt.note: Only European Community legislation printed in the paper edition of the Official Journal of the European Union is deemed authentic.

body.head: 80/565/Euratom: Council Decision of 9 June 1980 approving the conclusion by the Commission of the International Convention on the physical protection of nuclear material
body.p: COUNCIL DECISION of 9 June 1980 approving the conclusion by the Commission of the International Convention on the physical protection of nuclear material (80/565/Euratom)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Atomic Energy Community, and in particular the second paragraph of Article 101 thereof,
Having regard to the Commission draft,
Whereas the Commission has, in conformity with the Council Directives, negotiated the International Convention on the physical protection of nuclear material;
Whereas, therefore, the conclusion of the said Convention by the Commission should be approved,
The conclusion by the Commission of the International Convention on the physical protection of nuclear material is hereby approved.
